scripts.build:html: mkdir -p dist/es && resumed render resume.en.json -t jsonresume-theme-dev-ats -o dist/index.html && resumed render resume.es.json -t jsonresume-theme-dev-ats -o dist/es/index.html && node scripts/inject-export-button.js
scripts.build:pdf: mkdir -p dist && resumed export resume.en.json -t jsonresume-theme-dev-ats -o dist/resume.pdf
scripts.serve: npm run build:html && npx serve dist
